titleStmt.title: A vindication of the divines of the Church of England who have sworn allegiance to K. William & Q. Mary, from the imputations of apostasy and perjury, which are cast upon them upon that account, in the now publish'd History of passive obedience / by one of those divines.
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.

titleStmt.title: A vindication of the divines of the Church of England who have sworn allegiance to K. William & Q. Mary, from the imputations of apostasy and perjury, which are cast upon them upon that account, in the now publish'd History of passive obedience / by one of those divines.
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
A reply to Abednigo Seller's The history of passive obedience since the Reformation.
Attributed to Edward Fowler. cf. NUC pre-1956.
